thread.title: This Golden Retriever And Munchkin Cat Just Might Be The Very Best Friends Ever
thread.title_full: This Golden Retriever And Munchkin Cat Just Might Be The Very Best Friends Ever

author: Erin La Rosa
title: This Golden Retriever And Munchkin Cat Just Might Be The Very Best Friends Ever
text:
View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383048 2. And this munchkin kitty is The Whampus, Lewis’ cat brother. View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383045 3. Did I mention they also happen to be best friends? Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @lewis ID: 10383037 4. They do everything together, like staring at each other. View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383028 5. Taking cute little kitty and doggy naps together. View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383023 6. Enjoying photos of Michelle Obama together. View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383035 7. And heck, they even groom each other, because they’re just that close. Loading View on Instagram
lewisandthewhampus / Via Instagram: @lewis ID: 10383034 8. The Whampus likes to keep an eye on his big brother at all times. View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383027 9. And Lewis makes sure that his little brother is safe whenever he can. View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383115 10. Mainly, they just have the very best time together. I mean, LOOK at how happy The Whampus is! View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383041 11. And how could you not be happy when you always have someone to cuddle with? View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383051 12. And always have someone you can chill with after a super long day? View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com ID: 10383065 13. Best friends, they’re just the tops (and cutest), right? View this image ›
lewisandthewhampus / Via instagram.com You can follow Lewis and The Whampus in all of their furry BFF adventures here .
ID: 10383074
